//mistake i did
//clarity in logic
//range of inputs
#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
long multi2[32];
int l = 1;
long binarysearch(long n) {
	int low = 0;
	int high = l - 1;
	int mid;
	long result;

	while (low != high) {
		mid = (low + high) / 2;
		if (multi2[mid] <= n) {
			if (multi2[mid + 1] > n) {
				result = multi2[mid];
				break;
			} else {
				low = mid + 1;
			}
		} else {
			high = mid ;
		}

	}

	return result;

}

int main() {

	long n = 1;
	multi2[0] = 1;
	int t;
	while (n < 1000000001) {
		n = n * 2;
		multi2[l] = n;
		l++;
	}
	cin >> t;
	while (t--) {

		cin >> n;
		cout<<binarysearch(n)<<endl;
	}

	return 0;
}
